Question
========

Suppose the independent probability that three individuals *A*, *B* and *C* will be alive in 30 years are still alive is equal to 0.4; 0.3 and 0.5, respectively. Then what is the probability that they will all be alive in 30 years?

Answerlist
----------

* 0,06
* 0,3
* 0,12
* 0,18

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.06: Correct
* 0.3: Incorrect
* 0.12: Incorrect
* 0.18: Incorrect
